alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade, central Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 506 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from 12 miles west of Loxahatchee NWR to 8 miles west of Intersection Krome And U.S. 27. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Wellington, Weston, Doral, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Parkland, Hialeah Gardens, Sweetwater, Medley, Loxahatchee NWR, Fountainbleau, Palm Springs North, Pennsuco and Intersection Krome And U.S. 27. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
